titleStmt.title: A just and righteous plea presented unto the King of England, and his council, &c. being the true state of the present case of the people, called Quakers, truly demonstrated, and justly pleaded, on their behalf : and this is laid down in six particulars ... / by ... Edw. Burroughs.
titleStmt.author: Burrough, Edward, 1634-1662.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
